column2: $ORDER$$SECOND_ADJ$ Civil War to Permit Vassal Cooperation in $OTHER_TITLE$
§Y[This.GetBestName]§! can declare open rebellion to force §Y[This.Liege.GetBestName]§! to legalize autonomous vassal cooperation throughout the de facto §Y[This.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§!.
§Y[From.GetBestName]§!, as well as any of [From.GetHerHis] own lieges, are not in open revolt.
